meanings.sent1: Her noncommitment to the project was evident in her lack of effort.
meanings.sent2: His noncommitment to the team showed in his absence from all the meetings.
meanings.sent3: The noncommitment of the cat to catching the mouse led to a playful chase instead.
meanings.sent4: The noncommitment of the clouds to rain left the fields parched and dry.
meanings.sent5: The noncommitment of the student to studying resulted in poor grades.

meanings.definition: Refusal to make a firm decision or promise.
meanings.sent1: The politician's noncommitment to the issue frustrated the voters.
meanings.sent2: Her noncommitment to attending the party left her friends unsure if she would show up.
meanings.sent3: The noncommitment of the dog to choosing a toy made the decision-making process amusing.
meanings.sent4: The noncommitment of the wind to a direction left the sailboat stranded in the middle of the lake.
meanings.sent5: The noncommitment of the customer to buying the product made the salesperson's job challenging.
